title: MediaPad T1 8.0 Pro 4G
shortDescr: 8 inches IPS full-view-angle IPS display 1280 × 800 pixels

overview.title: Tap into stunning design.
overview.text: Inspired by the soft and elegant shape of a Swan’s wings, the MediaPad T1 slips seamlessly into your hand. Precision technology also makes the frame slimmer and easier to use while a sandblasted, aircraft-grade aluminum back shell rounds off a perfect look.

overview.title: Vibrant colors.Beautifully displayed.
overview.text: A 1280x800 IPS display reproduces over 90% of Adobe RGB color space to deliver brighter colors and contrasts. With a 16:10 screen ratio, you also get a 20% bigger image display than a 4:3 screen ratio while a 178° wide-view angle makes for a naturally rotating screen.

overview.title: Plug in and power yourself up.
overview.text: Now you can boost your device’s potential without sacrificing battery power. With a 4800 mAh battery, you get up to 16 hours of Internet browsing time, 36 hours for 3G voice calls and 13 hours of non-stop entertainment as well as a whopping 20 days on standby. It’s time to get more out of your device.

overview.title: 1.2 GHz quad-core technology.Power becomes more powerful.
overview.text: A 1.2 GHz quad-core Qualcomm processor coupled with Android 4.3 Jelly Bean gives the MediaPad T1 a powerful punch. Whether it's watching HD movies, playing action-packed games, or working on an important presentation, everything looks and performs faster and smoother. Power has just received an upgrade to powerful.

overview.title: State-of-the-art technology speaks volumes.
overview.text: The MediaPad T1 supports 2G/3G voice calling services to guarantee clearer, crisper communication, anywhere. At last a better sound experience meets beautiful, easy-to-use design.

overview.title: The power to do more. All at once.
overview.text: With the MediaPad T1’s special floating video function, you don’t have to switch back and forth between two different screens while watching your favorite movies – view it all simultaneously instead. Just another way your MediaPad T1 delivers more.
